netboard
Class SocketConnection

java.lang.Object
  netboard.SocketConnection

public class SocketConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Class handling the connection with another instance of netboard (via TCP/IP sockets)

Nested Class Summary
static class SocketConnection.Exception
          Class to be thrown in the constructor when an object cannot be constructed
 
Constructor Summary

          Creates a new instance of SocketConnection and starts the connection thread
 
Method Summary

          Provides that when next communication task is performed, the connection will be closed
static void emergencyDisconnect(java.lang.String reason)
          Sets everything like the connection was disconnected but does not touch the connection itself.

Constructor Detail

SocketConnection

public SocketConnection(java.lang.String destination,
                        int mode)
                 throws SocketConnection.Exception
Creates a new instance of SocketConnection and starts the connection thread

Parameters:
destination - Address of the destination host
mode - Mode of the connection: Main.SERVER_MODE - server, Main.CLIENT_MODE - client
Throws:
SocketConnection.Exception - When an object cannot be constructed (i.e. the connection cannot be established)
See Also:
disconnect(), Main.connected, Main.isConnected(), Main.setConnected(boolean), Main.connect(), Main.disconnect()
Method Detail

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Provides that when next communication task is performed, the connection will be closed

See Also:
disconnect, SocketConnection.WritingTask.run(), SocketConnection.ReadingTask.run(), SocketConnection(java.lang.String, int), Main.connected, Main.isConnected(), Main.setConnected(boolean), Main.connect(), Main.disconnect()

emergencyDisconnect

public static void emergencyDisconnect(java.lang.String reason)
Sets everything like the connection was disconnected but does not touch the connection itself. Useful for emergency situations - e.g. when an instance of SocketConnection couldn't be created and no connection exists.

Parameters:
reason - The reason for the emergency disconnection. It is show to the user in the status bar.
